CONTACT_DESCRIPTION: If you have any concerns or suggestions, send us a message and we will respond as soon as possible.
NAME: Name
CVTHEQUE_DESCRIPTION: Your one-stop solution for managing and sharing your CVs with ease.
ACCESS_TALENT_POOL: Access to a Vast Talent Pool
EASILY_SEARCH_CANDIDATES: Easily search, filter, and find qualified candidates suited for various roles across industries
STANDARDIZED_CV_FORMATS: View standardized CV formats, skill summaries, and candidate profiles to streamline the hiring process
SAVE_AND_ORGANIZE_PROFILES: Save and organize favorite profiles, and set notifications for new candidates meeting your requirements
CONTACT_AND_SCHEDULE_INTERVIEWS: Contact candidates directly or schedule interviews within the platform
MAKE_INFORMED_RECRUITMENT_DECISIONS: Access data on search trends and hiring stats to make informed recruitment decisions
JOBSEEKER_CREATE_CUSTOM_CV: Create and customize a standout CV with templates that suit various industries and roles.
JOBSEEKER_RECEIVE_JOB_MATCHES: Receive job matches based on your skills, experience, and career goals.
JOBSEEKER_SHOWCASE_SKILLS: Showcase your skills and achievements directly to top companies
JOBSEEKER_TRACK_APPLICATION_STATUS: Stay updated on the status of your applications, from submission to interview invites
JOBSEEKER_ACCESS_CAREER_TOOLS: Access tools and tips on improving your CV, acing interviews, and advancing your career
CONFIRM_REMOVE_TOOL: Are you sure you want to remove the tool "{{toolName}}"?
IRREVERSIBLE_ACTION: This action is irreversible and you won't be able to get it back unless you pay again!
BUY_TOOL_DESCRIPTION: Points allow you to access premium tools and features. You can purchase more anytime
NEW_PASSWORD_MIN_LENGTH: New password must be at least 8 characters long.
DEACTIVATE_ACCOUNT_DESCRIPTION: Deactivating your account will make it inaccessible until you decide to reactivate it. You will lose access to your account and its associated data, but your information will remain in our system for potential reactivation.
PERMANENT_ACTION_WARNING: This action is permanent and cannot be undone. Make sure you're certain before proceeding!
PROFILE_DESCRIPTION: Manage your personal and company profile information.
